item.description:
Part 4 of the Massachusetts Appalachian Trail! Join us on Saturday August 6th to do the fourth part of a series of hikes that I will be scheduling to do the entire length of the Massachusetts Appalachian Trail. We will meet at the AT trail head on Main st in Tyringham, which will be the ending location of our hike. We'll then leave half the cars and drive over to the AT trail head on rt 23 (the ending location of the last hike). This is the longest hike of our AT sections so far with a total distance of 12.3 miles....this is necessitated by lack of trail access in this stretch. Total elevation gain is about 1200 ft. Based on our past hiking speeds this will be a 7 or 8 hour hike.

 

Total Mass AT Hiked Before this section: 22.4 out of 89.7 25% Total Mass AT Hiked After this section: 34.7 out of 89.7 39%

 

Is This Hike for Me?

This is a lengthy hike with some elevation gains. We will have to move at good pace because of the length of the hike. Please bring plenty of water (I'm bringing 3 liters) appropriate hiking attire (no jeans or cotton, hiking boots not sneakers), rain gear in case the weather turns nasty, lunch, and snacks. 

 

Trailhead Directions

From Providence 2 hours 20 minutes

From Newport 3 hours

Trailhead lat/lon: 42.234901, -73.194351

The trail head parking lot is on Main st in Tyringham between Jerusalem road and Monterey road. It is about 1 mile south of the Tyringham post office which is located at 118 main. Google Maps link to the location:

http://maps.google.com/maps?q=42.234901,+-73.194351&hl=en&ll=42.232076,-73.197269&spn=0.027422,0.052099&sll=37.0625,-95.677068&sspn=59.119059,106.699219&z=15

 

Street view of trail:

http://maps.google.com/maps?q=42.234901,+-73.194351&hl=en&ll=42.235286,-73.194287&spn=0.006855,0.013025&sll=42.234907,-73.194259&sspn=0.013618,0.00851&layer=c&cbp=13,270.43,,0...

 

 

  Route Information (starting from rt 23)

1.2 miles to Beartown State Forest

2.1 miles to Mt Wilcox South Shelter

1.8 miles to Mt Wilcox North Shelter

2.3 miles to exit of Beartown State Forest

1.8 miles to Shaker Campsite

2 miles to Jerusalem road

1.1 miles to Tyringham main rd

 

 

Carpool Option

Please use the comments section to coordinate with other hikers if you want to carpool. There is limited parking so car pooling is recommended....just remember that we do have to carspot.

 

Massachusetts Appalachian Trail Series

MAP NOTE: What we have hiked is in black, current section in red, remaining trail red dots.

 

 

Liability Waiver

As a condition of your voluntary participation in this activity you acknowledge and agree to the following: this activity involves inherent risks that can cause property damage, injury, illness, disability, and/or death to participants and/or others; you assume all risk associated with this activity; you are responsible for having the necessary knowledge, skills, abilities, clothing, and equipment to safely participate in this activity; you know and will follow the Hiker Responsibility Code described at www.hikesafe.com; the leader(s) of this activity are volunteers; and you for yourself, your heirs, executors, and administrators release, hold harmless, and indemnify the leader(s) and all members of this group from any and all claims for property damage, injury, illness, disability, and/or death - including those caused by negligence and/or other reasons.
item.how_to_find_us: AT Trailhead on Main st Tyringham, look for a grey Nissan Juke with RI plates. Cell: 508-414-8544. See directions below.
item.name: Massachusetts Appalachian Trail: Part 4
